title: The Speed of Light
content: Light travels at approximately 299,792 kilometers per second in a vacuum.

title: Human DNA
content: If unwound and linked together, the DNA in all the cells in your body would stretch about 10 billion miles, which is from Earth to Pluto and back.

title: Water on Earth
content: About 71% of the Earth's surface is covered by water, but only about 3% of it is fresh water.
